page.title: 11Crownpoint Rd Sports Complex
page.content: This new Sports Complex, in the east end of Glasgow is one of the best and most modern in Scotland.It cost Â£2.7m to construct with aid of Â£1.2m from the Scottish Development Agency.The district council has allocated Â£700,000, the remainder comes from the Region and the Scottish Sports council , as well as urban aid.The Glasgow district will own and manage the complex but the region will share in the Â£250,000 running costs. The complex has a crowd capacity of 10,000 + people.The park has an international athletics track, 5 ball game pitches and a modern sports center.The complex will be used by the surrounding schools during the week and on holidays and weekends the amenities will be open to the public.There is a permanent staff of approx 30 people.
